name: Avoid using 'System.err' and 'System.out' outside a try catch block
description: 'System.err' and 'System.out' should not be used outside a try catch block.
output: This report lists all Methods using 'System.err' and 'System.out' outside a try catch block. It provides the following information: Method full name
alternativeName: Ensure to have other ways of listing errors outside a try/catch  than 'System.err' and 'System.out'

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
